top.text: It is not cheating, I would say. It's a coding error, probably made by the automation team. The email is not just for you—I’m sure it was sent to a large number of policyholders with similar expiry dates. The coder simply forgot to check the year for expiry.

top.author: @MSCloudBackup
top.text: AI actually helps small businesses in 3 places: • Inbox triage • Meeting follow-up • Reporting clarity But here’s the rule: AI drafts. Humans decide. Efficiency is powerful. Unmanaged AI is risk. More in Part 2 #AI #SmallBusiness #Leadership
top.translationZh:
AI在3个地方确实能帮到小企业：
• 邮件筛选分类
• 会议后续跟进
• 报告清晰呈现

但有个铁律：AI负责起草，人类负责拍板。

效率很强大，失控的AI就是风险。

第二部分详细展开 #AI #SmallBusiness #Leadership
